      返回:

    • nameAsBytes

      public byte[] nameAsBytes(int platformId, int encodingId, int languageId, int nameId)
      Get the name as bytes for the specified name. If there is no entry for the requested name then null is returned.
      参数:
      platformId - the platform id
      encodingId - the encoding id
      languageId - the language id
      nameId - the name id
      返回:
      the bytes for the name

    • name

      public String name(int index)
      Get the name as a String for the given name record. If there is no encoding conversion available for the name record then a best attempt String will be returned.
      参数:
      index - the index of the name record
      返回:
      the name

    • name

      public String name(int platformId, int encodingId, int languageId, int nameId)
      Get the name as a String for the specified name. If there is no entry for the requested name then null is returned. If there is no encoding conversion available for the name then a best attempt String will be returned.
      参数:
      platformId - the platform id
      encodingId - the encoding id
      languageId - the language id
      nameId - the name id
      返回:
      the name

    • nameEntry

      public NameTable.NameEntry nameEntry(int index)
      Get the name entry record for the given name entry.
      参数:
      index - the index of the name record
      返回:
      the name entry

    • nameEntry

      public NameTable.NameEntry nameEntry(int platformId, int encodingId, int languageId, int nameId)
      Get the name entry record for the specified name. If there is no entry for the requested name then null is returned.
      参数:
      platformId - the platform id
      encodingId - the encoding id
      languageId - the language id
      nameId - the name id
      返回:
      the name entry

    • names

      public Set<NameTable.NameEntry> names()
      Get all the name entry records.
      返回:
      the set of all name entry records

    • iterator

      public Iterator<NameTable.NameEntry> iterator()
      指定者:
      iterator 在接口中 Iterable<NameTable.NameEntry>

    • iterator

      public Iterator<NameTable.NameEntry> iterator(NameTable.NameEntryFilter filter)
      Get an iterator over name entries in the name table.
      参数:
      filter - a filter to select acceptable name entries
      返回:
      an iterator over name entries
